introduction.p1: At Restio, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our vacation management platform.
introduction.p2: We are committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring transparency in our data practices. Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data.

collection.intro: We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.item1: Name, email address, and contact details
personal.item2: Job title, department, and company information

communication.title: Communication Data
communication.item1: Messages and notifications within the platform
communication.item2: Support tickets and customer service communications

usage.intro: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
usage.item1: Providing, maintaining, and improving our services
usage.item2: Processing vacation requests and managing time-off workflows
usage.item3: Sending you notifications, updates, and administrative messages
usage.item4: Analyzing usage patterns to enhance user experience
usage.item5: Ensuring platform security and preventing fraud
usage.item6: Complying with legal obligations and enforcing our terms
usage.item7: Responding to your inquiries and providing customer support
usage.promise: We will never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

sharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

organization.title: With Your Organization:
organization.description: Your employer or organization administrators have access to information necessary for managing vacation requests and team coordination

providers.title: Service Providers:
providers.description: We work with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our platform (e.g., hosting, analytics, payment processing)

legal.title: Legal Requirements:
legal.description: When required by law, court order, or government regulation

business.title: Business Transfers:
business.description: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

consent.title: With Your Consent:
consent.description: When you explicitly authorize us to share specific information

security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

measures.title: Our security measures include:
measures.item2: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
measures.item4: Secure data centers with physical security measures
measures.item5: Employee training on data protection practices
measures.item6: Incident response procedures and breach notification protocols

security.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but continuously work to enhance our security measures.

cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content. Cookies are small data files stored on your device.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic platform functionality, authentication, and security.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how users interact with our platform to improve services.

cookies.control: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect platform functionality.

rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: Access:
access.description: Request access to the personal information we hold about you

correction.title: Correction:
correction.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information

deletion.title: Deletion:
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal information under certain circumstances

portability.title: Data Portability:
portability.description: Receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used format

objection.title: Objection:
objection.description: Object to processing of your personal information for certain purposes

restriction.title: Restriction:
restriction.description: Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances

rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact Us section.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

acceptance.p2: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services. Your continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of these terms and any modifications we may make from time to time.

includes.title: Our services include:

accounts.p2: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and keep your account information updated. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.

intellectual.p2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works from, publicly display, or exploit any of our content without our prior written consent.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.intro: We are committed to protecting your personal data and privacy rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This page explains how we comply with GDPR and what rights you have.

principles.title: Our GDPR Principles
principles.subtitle: We adhere to the six fundamental principles of GDPR in all our data processing activities.

lawfulness.title: Lawfulness & Transparency
lawfulness.description: We process data lawfully, fairly, and transparently in accordance with GDPR requirements.

purpose.title: Purpose Limitation
purpose.description: Data is collected for specific, explicit, and legitimate purposes only.

minimization.title: Data Minimization
minimization.description: We collect only data that is necessary for the intended purpose.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: Personal data is kept accurate and up to date with mechanisms for correction.

storage.title: Storage Limitation
storage.description: Data is retained only as long as necessary for the specified purposes.

integrity.title: Integrity & Confidentiality
integrity.description: Appropriate security measures protect data from unauthorized processing.

rights.title: Your GDPR Rights
rights.subtitle: Under GDPR, you have comprehensive rights regarding your personal data. Here's what you can do:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: Correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten").

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

object.title: Right to Object
object.description: Object to processing of your personal data for specific purposes.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: Request restriction of processing under certain conditions.

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
legal.contract: Contract Performance: To provide our services as per our agreement with you
legal.legitimate: Legitimate Interests: To improve and optimize our platform
legal.legalObligation: Legal Obligations: To comply with applicable laws and regulations
legal.consent: Consent: Where you have given explicit consent for specific purposes

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.description: When we transfer personal data outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission, to protect your data.

breach.title: Data Breach Notification
breach.description: In the event of a data breach that poses a risk to your rights and freedoms, we will notify you and the relevant supervisory authority within 72 hours of becoming aware of the breach, in accordance with GDPR requirements.

supervisory.title: Supervisory Authority
supervisory.p1: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe we have not complied with GDPR requirements. The supervisory authority in your jurisdiction can investigate your complaint and take appropriate action.
supervisory.p2: However, we encourage you to contact us first so we can address your concerns directly and work together to resolve any issues.

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer
dpo.subtitle: For any questions about GDPR compliance or to exercise your rights, contact our Data Protection Officer:
dpo.responseTime: We aim to respond to all GDPR-related requests within 30 days.
